com.ibm.team.build.common.notification

Class NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinitionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.team.build.common.notification.NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinitionHelper

  • public class NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinitionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for getting/setting NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinition objects. These objects are created from several configuration properties of the build definition's "Email Notification" configuration element.
    Since:
    0.8

    • Constructor Detail

      • NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinitionHelper

        public NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinitionHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCriteriasFromBuildDefinition

        public static java.util.List<NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinition> getAllCriteriasFromBuildDefinition(IBuildDefinition buildDefinition)
        Returns a list of criteria objects that may have been defined in the build definition. Criterias are stored as configuration properties in the Email Notification configuration element of the build definition.
        Parameters:
        buildDefinition - The build definition in which to look for notification criteria
        Returns:
        a list of criteria objects, possibly empty, never null.

      • getNumCriteriasProperty

        public static int getNumCriteriasProperty(IBuildDefinition buildDefinition)
        Returns the value representing the number of criterias that are saved in the build definition. This value is stored as a configuration property in the Email Notification configuration element of the build definition.
        Parameters:
        buildDefinition - The build definition which may contain saved criteria
        Returns:
        the number of criteria properties stored for this build definition. The return will be 0 under the following conditions: 1. The Email Notification configuration element does not exist. 2. The appropriate configuration property does not exist. 3. The value of the appropriate configuration property does not contain a parsable integer. 4. The value of the appropriate configuration property is 0.

      • getCriteriaFromProperties

        public static NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinition getCriteriaFromProperties(IBuildDefinition buildDefinition,
                                                                                int criteriaNumber)
        Returns a NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinition object that may have been defined in the build definition. This object is created based on several configuration property values stored in the Email Notification configuration element.
        Parameters:
        buildDefinition - The build definition in which to look for notification criteria
        criteriaNumber - The requested criteria to retrieve
        Returns:
        NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinition The criteria object as defined by several configuration properties. Default values will be assumed if configuration properties are not saved. null will be returned under the following conditions: 1. The Email Notification configuration element does not exist. 2. The configuration property representing the name of the criteria does not exist.

      • createPropertiesFromCriteria

        public static void createPropertiesFromCriteria(IBuildDefinition buildDefinition,
                                                NotificationCriteriaFromBuildDefinition criteria)
        Create several build definition configuration properties representing the given criteria object.
        Parameters:
        buildDefinition - The build definition in which to save configuration properties. It is expected that given build definition contains the email notification configuration element.
        criteria - The criteria object used to create the configuration properties in the build definition.

      • deleteCriteriaProperties

        public static void deleteCriteriaProperties(IBuildDefinition buildDefinition,
                                            int criteriaNumber)
        Deletes all build definition configuration properties that represent a criteria matching the given criteria number. For example, if criteriaNumber is 0, then one of the configuration properties removed would be "build.email.criteria.0.name".
        Parameters:
        buildDefinition - The build definition in which to delete configuration properties. It is expected that given build definition contains the email notification configuration element.
        criteriaNumber - The number of the criteria object that is to be deleted.

      • arrayToString

        public static java.lang.String arrayToString(java.lang.String[] array,
                                             java.lang.String separator)
        Parameters:
        array - The string array that will be converted to a single string
        separator - The string that is put between each element of the passed in array
        Returns:
        A single string consisting of the elements of the array separated by the separator string
